history.proof: intros H1 H2. unfold eventually, ex_lim_seq, ex_lim_seq in *. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_lim_seq_ext_loc.

original: intros H1 H2. intros H3 H4. unfold eventually, ex_lim_seq, ex_lim_seq in *. intros H5 [l H6]. exists l. apply (is_lim_seq_ext_loc u v l) in H1. apply (is_lim_seq_ext_loc u v l) in H2. apply H1. apply H6. apply H2. apply H4.
